mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO ,MEM_NO ,(SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) AS NAME ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT ,MOD_DT ,DEL_YN FROM BOARD B WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, MEM_NO, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_NO)+ 1, 0) AS BOARD_NO FROM BOARD), #{mem_no}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO ,MEM_NO ,(SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) AS NAME ,(SELECT PICTURE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) AS PICTURE ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,REG_DT ,MOD_DT ,DEL_YN FROM BOARD B WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
